billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

title: Mandates that every owner of a cabaret establishment, but which is not a restaurant shall install security cameras
summary: Enacts "Imette's Law"; mandates that every owner of an cabaret establishment, but which is not a restaurant, shall install security cameras at every entrance and exit of such establishment.
currentCommittee: COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to mandating the installation of security cameras in cabaret establishments
